name: Dhaka
description: Dhaka is the capital city of Bangladesh, known for its vibrant culture, rich history, and bustling markets.

name: Kuakata
description: Kuakata is a coastal town in Bangladesh known for its panoramic sea view, sandy beach, and colorful sunrise and sunset.

name: Jaflong
description: Jaflong is famous for its rolling hills, pristine river, and collection of unique stone formations.

name: Saint Martin
description: Saint Martin is a small island in the Bay of Bengal, known for its clear turquoise waters, white sandy beaches, and coral reefs.
